articles.description: Follow match build-up, live text updates and listen to radio commentary from the opening weekend of the Premier League, starting with Ipswich Town taking on Liverpool.
articles.title: Ipswich Town v Liverpool LIVE: Premier League score, commentary, line-ups, stats & latest updates, followed by five more matches

articles.description: The Premier League begins this weekend, with Manchester City bidding to continue their supremacy in English football and Ipswich Town making their top-flight return.
articles.title: Premier League 2024-25: New rules, new managers and what to expect this season

articles.description: New Zealand thrash Argentina 42-10 to avenge the defeat by the Pumas in their opening match of the 2024 Rugby Championship.
articles.title: Rugby Championship: All Blacks thrash Argentina to avenge defeat by Pumas

articles.description: Follow live text commentary and listen to Squad Goals for all of the latest from the EFL.
articles.title: EFL LIVE: Follow text commentary, live scores and Squad Goals

articles.description: Manchester United's Joshua Zirkzee enjoyed a dream debut in win against Fulham, but what next for Jadon Sancho?
articles.title: Man Utd 1-0 Fulham: Zirkzee makes dream start but what next for Sancho?

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says his team's 1-0 win over Fulham on the opening day of the Premier League can provide a "platform" for them to build on this season.
articles.title: Manchester United 1-0 Fulham: Win gives Man Utd platform to build on - Erik Ten Hag

articles.description: Jack Draper beats Felix Auger-Aliassime in controversial circumstances at the Cincinnati Open as Carlos Alcaraz smashes his racquet during a defeat by Gael Monfils.
articles.title: Cincinnati Open: Jack Draper earns controversial win as Carlos Alcaraz smashes racquet in defeat

articles.description: Find out which part of Team GB won the most medals at this years Olympics
articles.title: Team GB Paris 2024 Olympic medallists by location

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on The Courteeners frontman Liam Fray to make his predictions for the opening round of Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League opening-weekend predictions: Chris Sutton faces The Courteeners frontman Liam Fray

articles.description: Harry Kane is on the scoresheet as Bayern Munich thrash second-division Ulm in the German Cup in manager Vincent Kompany's first match in charge.
articles.title: Ulm vs Bayern Munich: Harry Kane scores as Vincent Kompany starts with win
